name: MANILA: Explore. Eat. Discover.
description: Mabuhay! Welcome to Manila, embark on a trip that will make you feel like a true Pinoy, we will go to places that locals frequent to, like where they take lunch breaks, get fresh seafood and fruits, buy snacks and hang out at night. Iconic tourist spots such as the Rizal Park and Binondo Church are musts on our trip, specially if you are into photography.  Journey to two (2) of the top Universities in the country and have a close look on how a local student life transpire.  Of course Filipino fare is not to be missed, be sure to bring your adventurous appetites.  Pasalubong (souvenir, take home gifts) shopping is also in between our full day activity.  Please bring an umbrella and cap or rain coat.  You may bring extra shirt and/or shorts and sandals or slippers as extra foot wear and leave this inside the car.  Closed shoes is required inside the Money Museum.  Please wear light clothing that can also be appropriate inside the museum.
